blogs.title: Any use for \(F_4\) in hep-th?
blogs.summary:
Yuji asked: In high energy physics, the use of the classical Lie groups are common place, and in the Grand Unification the use of \(E_{6,7,8}\) is also common place. 

In string theory \(G_2\) is sometimes utilized, e.g. the \(G_2\)-holonomy manifolds are

q&a.title: Any use for $F_4$ in hep-th?
q&a.summary:
In high energy physics, the use of the classical Lie groups are common place, and in the Grand Unification the use of $E_{6,7,8}$ is also common place. 

In string theory $G_2$ is sometimes utilized, e.g. the $G_2$-holonomy manifolds are used to get 4d $\m
